metatable.map: select md.chembl_id, css.ctab, cp.full_mwt molweight, cp.full_molformula molformula, cs.canonical_smiles molsmiles from chembl_owner.compound_struct_symyx css, chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md, chembl_owner.compound_structures cs, chembl_owner.compound_properties cp where cs.molregno = md.molregno and css.molregno = md.molregno and cp.molregno (+) = md.molregno
SELECT md.chembl_id, cp.* from chembl_26.compound_properties cp left join chembl_26.molecule_dictionary md on cp.molregno = md.molregno

c.name: molecular_species
c.desc: Indicates whether the compound is an acid/base/neutral

c.name: full_mwt
c.desc: Molecular weight of the full compound including any salts

c.name: qed_weighted
c.desc: Weighted quantitative estimate of drug likeness (as defined by Bickerton et al., Nature Chem 2012)

c.name: full_molformula
c.desc: Molecular formula for the full compound (including any salt)

c.name: hba_lipinski
c.desc: Number of hydrogen bond acceptors calculated according to Lipinski's original rules (i.e., N + O count))

c.name: hbd_lipinski
c.desc: Number of hydrogen bond donors calculated according to Lipinski's original rules (i.e., NH + OH count)

c.name: num_lipinski_ro5_violations
c.desc: Number of violations of Lipinski's rule of five using HBA_LIPINSKI and HBD_LIPINSKI counts

metatable.map: select distinct md.* from chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md where md.molregno is not null

select distinct md.molregno molID, md.chembl_id, cs.canonical_smiles smiles, cs.canonical_smiles str_smiles, cp.Full_MWT, cp.AlogP, cp.acd_logp, cp.acd_logD, cr.src_compound_id, ac.standard_value, ac.standard_units, ac.standard_type, ac.activity_comment, ass.assay_id, td.pref_name, ac.standard_relation, c.accession, ass.confidence_score, td.organism, td.organism org, pfc.L1, pfc.L2, pfc.L3, docs.Journal||','||docs.year||','||docs.volume||','||docs.issue||','||docs.first_page||'-'||docs.last_page source, td.target_type targettype from chembl_owner.compound_structures cs, chembl_owner.compound_properties cp, chembl_owner.compound_records cr, chembl_owner.molecule_hierarchy mh, chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md, chembl_owner.target_dictionary td, target_type tt, target_components tc, component_sequences c , chembl_owner.assays ass, chembl_owner.PROTEIN_FAMILY_CLASSIFICATION pfc, chembl_owner.COMPONENT_CLASS cc, chembl_owner.activities ac, chembl_owner.DOCS docs where mh.molregno = md.molregno and md.molregno = cp.molregno and md.molregno = cr.molregno and mh.parent_molregno = cs.molregno and cr.record_id = ac.record_id and ass.assay_id = ac.assay_id and td.tid = ass.tid and td.target_type = tt.target_type and td.tid = tc.tid (+) and tc.component_id = c.component_id (+) and tt.parent_type = 'PROTEIN' AND ASS.DOC_ID = DOCS.doc_id AND (C.COMPONENT_ID = CC.COMPONENT_ID(+)) AND (C.COMPONENT_ID = PFC.PROTEIN_CLASS_ID(+)) AND (ASS.ASSAY_TYPE IN ('B', 'F')) AND (TD.TARGET_TYPE in ('SINGLE PROTEIN', 'PROTEIN FAMILY', 'PROTEIN COMPLEX','SELECTIVITY GROUP', 'PROTEIN COMPLEX GROUP','PROTEIN-PROTEIN INTERACTION')) AND (C.DB_SOURCE = 'SWISS-PROT') AND (TD.ORGANISM IN ('Bos taurus','Homo sapiens', 'Mus musculus', 'Rattus norvegicus')) AND (ASS.CONFIDENCE_SCORE >= 4) order by standard_value,accession

metatable.l: ChEMBL CRC (Potency, IC50, Ki, EC50, Kd, Kb, Ki app, K app) Assay Data
metatable.map: select distinct md.molregno molID, md.chembl_id, cs.canonical_smiles smiles, cs.canonical_smiles str_smiles, cp.Full_MWT, cp.AlogP, cp.acd_logp, cp.acd_logD, cr.src_compound_id, ac.standard_value, (round(-log(10,ac.standard_value),2) + 9) pAct, ac.standard_units, ac.standard_type, ac.activity_comment, ass.assay_id, td.pref_name, ac.standard_relation, c.accession, ass.confidence_score, td.organism, td.organism org, pfc.L1, pfc.L2, pfc.L3, docs.Journal||','||docs.year||','||docs.volume||','||docs.issue||','||docs.first_page||'-'||docs.last_page source, td.target_type targettype from chembl_owner.compound_structures cs, chembl_owner.compound_properties cp, chembl_owner.compound_records cr, chembl_owner.molecule_hierarchy mh, chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md, chembl_owner.target_dictionary td, chembl_owner.target_type tt, chembl_owner.target_components tc, chembl_owner.component_sequences c, chembl_owner.assays ass, chembl_owner.PROTEIN_FAMILY_CLASSIFICATION pfc, chembl_owner.COMPONENT_CLASS cc, chembl_owner.activities ac, chembl_owner.DOCS docs, (SELECT distinct ASSAY_ID, 'CRC' AS MEASUREMENT FROM chembl_owner.ACTIVITIES WHERE (ACTIVITIES.STANDARD_UNITS IN ('nM', 'uM', 'um', 'M', 'mM', 'pM')) AND (ACTIVITIES.STANDARD_TYPE IN ('Potency', 'IC50', 'Ki', 'EC50', 'Kd', 'Kb', 'Ki app', 'KB', 'K app'))) TEMP1 where mh.molregno = md.molregno and md.molregno = cp.molregno and md.molregno = cr.molregno and mh.parent_molregno = cs.molregno and cr.record_id = ac.record_id and ass.assay_id = ac.assay_id and td.tid = ass.tid and td.target_type = tt.target_type and td.tid = tc.tid (+) and tc.component_id = c.component_id (+) and tt.parent_type = 'PROTEIN' AND ASS.DOC_ID = DOCS.doc_id AND (C.COMPONENT_ID = CC.COMPONENT_ID(+)) AND (C.COMPONENT_ID = PFC.PROTEIN_CLASS_ID(+)) AND (ASS.ASSAY_ID = TEMP1.ASSAY_ID) AND (ASS.ASSAY_TYPE IN ('B', 'F')) AND (TD.TARGET_TYPE in ('SINGLE PROTEIN', 'PROTEIN FAMILY', 'PROTEIN COMPLEX','SELECTIVITY GROUP', 'PROTEIN COMPLEX GROUP','PROTEIN-PROTEIN INTERACTION')) AND (C.DB_SOURCE = 'SWISS-PROT') AND (TD.ORGANISM IN ('Bos taurus','Homo sapiens', 'Mus musculus', 'Rattus norvegicus')) AND (ASS.CONFIDENCE_SCORE >= 4) and ac.standard_value>0

metatable.TableMap: select b.*, c.cpd_source, c.cpd_number,c.cpd_source||c.cpd_number chembl_id from stb_owner.stb_cpd_base b, stb_owner.stb_cpd c where b.cpd_id=c.cpd_id and c.cpd_source='CHEMBL'

select r.*, r.average_val AVERAGE_VAL_QN, r.most_potent_val MOST_POTENT_VAL_QN, CalcActivityBin(PREFIX, AVERAGE_VAL) ACTIVITY_BIN, CalcActivityBin(PREFIX, MOST_POTENT_VAL) ACTIVITY_BIN_MOST_POTENT, null TARGET_MAP_X, null TARGET_MAP_Y, concat(cpd_source,cpd_number) chembl_id from stb_owner.stb_nonsum r where CPD_SOURCE='CHEMBL'

c.name: ASSAY_TYPE
c.desc: Type of assay, e.g. binding, functional

c.name: ASSAY_MODE
c.desc: Mode of assay, e.g. agonist, antagonist, potentiator

c.name: ASSAY_MEASUREMENT
c.desc: Type of result, e.g. single point(SP) or concentration response curve (CRC)

metatable.TableMap: select r.cpd_source||r.cpd_number chembl_id, r.*, r.cpd_id , r.average_val AVERAGE_VAL_QN, r.most_potent_val MOST_POTENT_VAL_QN, CalcActivityBin(PREFIX, AVERAGE_VAL) ACTIVITY_BIN, CalcActivityBin(PREFIX, MOST_POTENT_VAL) ACTIVITY_BIN_MOST_POTENT, null TARGET_MAP_X, null TARGET_MAP_Y from stb_owner.stb_nonsum r where r.CPD_SOURCE='CHEMBL'

c.name: ASSAY_TYPE
c.desc: Type of assay, e.g. binding, functional

c.name: ASSAY_MODE
c.desc: Mode of assay, e.g. agonist, antagonist, potentiator

c.name: ASSAY_MEASUREMENT
c.desc: Type of result, e.g. single point(SP) or concentration response curve (CRC)

metatable.tablemap: select distinct md.* from chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md where chembl_id is not null

metatable.map: select md.*,b.molregno,bc.*,bcs.*,bcs.organism org from chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md, chembl_owner.biotherapeutics b, chembl_owner.biotherapeutic_components bc, chembl_owner.bio_component_sequences bcs where md.molregno=b.molregno(+) and b.molregno=bc.molregno(+) and bc.component_id=bcs.component_id(+) and md.molecule_type not like 'Small molecule'

select f.product_id, m.* from chembl_owner.formulations f, chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary m where f.molregno=m.molregno and product_id in ( select distinct product_id from formulations f, molecule_dictionary md where f.molregno=md.molregno and md.max_phase=4 and md.dosed_ingredient=1 and md.therapeutic_flag=1 group by product_id having count(distinct f.molregno) >1)
select distinct md.chembl_id, cp.* from chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md, chembl_owner.compound_properties cp where cp.molregno (+) = md.molregno

select distinct md.molregno molID, md.chembl_id, cr.src_compound_id, td.pref_name, ac.standard_type, ac.standard_value, ac.standard_units, ac.activity_comment, ac.standard_relation, ass.confidence_score, td.organism org, docs.Journal||','||docs.year||','||docs.volume||','||docs.issue||','||docs.first_page||'-'||docs.last_page source from chembl_owner.compound_structures cs, chembl_owner.compound_properties cp, chembl_owner.compound_records cr, chembl_owner.molecule_hierarchy mh, chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md, chembl_owner.target_dictionary td, target_type tt, target_components tc, chembl_owner.assays ass, chembl_owner.COMPONENT_CLASS cc, chembl_owner.activities ac, chembl_owner.DOCS docs where mh.molregno = md.molregno and md.molregno = cp.molregno and md.molregno = cr.molregno and mh.parent_molregno = cs.molregno and cr.record_id = ac.record_id and ass.assay_id = ac.assay_id and td.tid = ass.tid and td.target_type = tt.target_type and td.tid = tc.tid (+) and tt.parent_type = 'PROTEIN' AND ASS.DOC_ID = DOCS.doc_id AND (TD.ORGANISM IN ('Bos taurus','Homo sapiens', 'Mus musculus', 'Rattus norvegicus')) AND (ASS.CONFIDENCE_SCORE >= 4) AND ass.assay_type = 'A'

metatable.l: ChEMBL ADME Assay Data for SM
metatable.map: select distinct md.molregno molID, md.chembl_id, cr.src_compound_id, td.pref_name, ac.standard_type, ac.standard_value, ac.standard_units, ac.activity_comment, ac.standard_relation, ass.confidence_score, td.organism org, docs.Journal||','||docs.year||','||docs.volume||','||docs.issue||','||docs.first_page||'-'||docs.last_page source from chembl_owner.compound_structures cs, chembl_owner.compound_properties cp, chembl_owner.compound_records cr, chembl_owner.molecule_hierarchy mh, chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md, chembl_owner.target_dictionary td, target_type tt, target_components tc, chembl_owner.assays ass, chembl_owner.COMPONENT_CLASS cc, chembl_owner.activities ac, chembl_owner.DOCS docs where mh.molregno = md.molregno and md.molregno = cp.molregno and md.molregno = cr.molregno and mh.parent_molregno = cs.molregno and cr.record_id = ac.record_id and ass.assay_id = ac.assay_id and td.tid = ass.tid and td.target_type = tt.target_type and td.tid = tc.tid (+) and tt.parent_type = 'PROTEIN' AND ASS.DOC_ID = DOCS.doc_id AND (TD.ORGANISM IN ('Bos taurus','Homo sapiens', 'Mus musculus', 'Rattus norvegicus')) AND (ASS.CONFIDENCE_SCORE >= 4) AND ass.assay_type = 'A'
select * from chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md,chembl_owner.drug_mechanism mech where md.max_phase=4 and md.dosed_ingredient=1 and md.therapeutic_flag=1 and md.molregno=mech.molregno(+)
select * from chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md where md.max_phase=4 and md.dosed_ingredient=1 and md.therapeutic_flag=1

select distinct md.molregno molID, md.chembl_id, cr.src_compound_id, td.pref_name, ass.description descript, ac.standard_type, ac.standard_value, ac.standard_units, ac.activity_comment, ac.standard_relation, ass.confidence_score, td.organism org, docs.Journal||','||docs.year||','||docs.volume||','||docs.issue||','||docs.first_page||'-'||docs.last_page source from chembl_owner.compound_structures cs, chembl_owner.compound_properties cp, chembl_owner.compound_records cr, chembl_owner.molecule_hierarchy mh, chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md, chembl_owner.target_dictionary td, target_type tt, target_components tc, chembl_owner.assays ass, chembl_owner.COMPONENT_CLASS cc, chembl_owner.activities ac, chembl_owner.DOCS docs where mh.molregno = md.molregno and md.molregno = cp.molregno and md.molregno = cr.molregno and mh.parent_molregno = cs.molregno and cr.record_id = ac.record_id and ass.assay_id = ac.assay_id and td.tid = ass.tid and td.target_type = tt.target_type and td.tid = tc.tid (+) and tt.parent_type = 'PROTEIN' AND ASS.DOC_ID = DOCS.doc_id AND (ASS.CONFIDENCE_SCORE >= 4) AND assay_test_type='In vivo'

metatable.l: ChEMBL General in vivo Data for SM
metatable.map: select distinct md.molregno molID, md.chembl_id, cr.src_compound_id, td.pref_name, ass.description descript, ac.standard_type, ac.standard_value, ac.standard_units, ac.activity_comment, ac.standard_relation, ass.confidence_score, td.organism org, docs.Journal||','||docs.year||','||docs.volume||','||docs.issue||','||docs.first_page||'-'||docs.last_page source from chembl_owner.compound_structures cs, chembl_owner.compound_properties cp, chembl_owner.compound_records cr, chembl_owner.molecule_hierarchy mh, chembl_owner.molecule_dictionary md, chembl_owner.target_dictionary td, target_type tt, target_components tc, chembl_owner.assays ass, chembl_owner.COMPONENT_CLASS cc, chembl_owner.activities ac, chembl_owner.DOCS docs where mh.molregno = md.molregno and md.molregno = cp.molregno and md.molregno = cr.molregno and mh.parent_molregno = cs.molregno and cr.record_id = ac.record_id and ass.assay_id = ac.assay_id and td.tid = ass.tid and td.target_type = tt.target_type and td.tid = tc.tid (+) and tt.parent_type = 'PROTEIN' AND ASS.DOC_ID = DOCS.doc_id AND (ASS.CONFIDENCE_SCORE >= 4) AND assay_test_type='In vivo'

select md.chembl_id, css.ctab, cp.full_mwt molweight, cp.full_molformula molformula, cs.canonical_smiles molsmiles from chembl_owner_dev.compound_struct_symyx css, chembl_owner_dev.molecule_dictionary md, chembl_owner_dev.compound_structures cs, chembl_owner_dev.compound_properties cp where cs.molregno = md.molregno and css.molregno = md.molregno and cp.molregno (+) = md.molregno
